jd: From: Harsh Timori, Sibitalent h.timori@sibitalent.com Reply to: h.timori@sibitalent.com Note: Only need local candidate Onsite Interview :: Boston, MAJob Title – Full Stack Java Developer - SeniorJob Location –Local to Boston (Only) Onsite InterviewDuration – 6+ MonthsVisa – No CPT, H1BMode of Interview – F2F Job description - Looking for:-8+ years of experience developing web-based applications and development experience in Java/J2EE technologiesThe successful candidate must have, in order of importance:-Experience with Spring, Spring MVC, an ORM framework (myBatis or Hibernate preferred)-Experience using and implementing RESTful web services-Experience with Java, JavaScript, JSP, CSS, HTML, jQuery-Experience with multi-threading using core Java libraries particularly the Executor framework.-Knowledge of XML, JSON, and AJAX techniques-Strong understanding of SQL database design-Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment.The below skills are nice to have in addition to the required skills in order of preference:-Experience with JBoss, Apache, Tomcat-Experience with Angular, React, Node.js and XSLT-Experience with unit testing frameworks such as jUnit or Selenium-Strong understanding of stored procedures -Experience with Cloud technologies focused on AWS-Experience with CI/CD Pipelines Best from,Harsh Timori || Sibitalent
